string-array.name: version_changelog
string-array.item: 1.0.0: - Online Catalog Support; - Auto updates; - Map info; - Route calculating enhancements; - Schemes design update; - other bugs fixes and enhancements
1.0.1: - FC on map loading fixed (caused locales other than RU,EN)
1.0.6: - Fixed image scaling on QVGA/WVGA displays, improve image quality; - Added new zoom level, fixed zoom buttons behavior; - Fixed FC while create the route in some cities/schemes
1.0.7: - Fixed folder path bug at Samsung I9000 with Froyo; - Fixed autoupdate algorithm. When disabled application doesn\'t start in background

1.1.0: - Multitouch zooming; - Zooming using volume controls; - Move application to SD supported; - Trackball speed setting; - Added resources for WVGA/QVGA screens; - Find and Auto-Complete take into consideration with diacritics and ligatures; - Trackball scroll speed settings
1.1.1: - Fixed bug with FC on route search on some maps
